content: avoid a hole pick up 3 / 4 / 4 / 5 / 5 / 6 sts pm on the next round knit each extra stitch together with its adjacent stitch to close the gap you now have 50 / 58 / 60 / 64 / 66 / 70 sts knit the sleeve in the round until it measures about 3 cm from the armhole decrease row k1 k2tog knit to last 3 sts ssk k1 2 sts decrease repeat decrease row on every 3 / 4 / 4 / 4 / 4 / 4 cm 5 / 5 /5 / 6 / 6 / 7 times in total you now have 40 / 48 / 50 / 52 / 54 / 56 sts work sleeve until measures 18 / 22 / 26 / 28 / 30 / 32 cm from the armhole ribbing change to 3 5mm us 4 circular needles r1 k1 p1 * repeat * to eor repeat r1 until ribbing measures about 5 cm change to colour b r1 k all r2 s1pwyb p1 * repeat * to eor r3 k1 s1pwyf * repeat * to eor bind of with italian bind off method work the second sleeve in the same way finishing weave in all ends chart read chart bottom up and from right to left this pattern is for personal use only make sure to use #pinesweater and tag me on instagram @alazaorgu e-mail alazaknit@gmail com
